q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.models

Class PTNTransition

  • java.lang.Object
    • q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.models.PTNNode
      • q8388415.brero_massimiliano.PTNetEditor.models.PTNTransition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, PTNINodeDTO

    public class PTNTransition
extends PTNNode
implements java.io.Serializable
    Model representing a place. Needed e. g. for all writing and reading operations. Since the business logic is completely in PTNNet this is more of a data container. Will fire a property Change Event Derived from PTNNode.
    Author:
    q8388415 - Massimiliano Brero
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
